name: The Last Dodo (Struckdown, shahzeb97, Frozen Goyave, Andrew, tasteylunch)
name_original: The Last Dodo (Struckdown, shahzeb97, Frozen Goyave, Andrew, tasteylunch)
description:
Destroy the robot by using rocket and attacking it's control center 

Controls

Arrow keys to run

Shift to Dash

Space/up to jump
